      boolean canStructureGenerate(net.minecraft.block.Block block, int meta, Location location)

      • canStructureGenerate

        public boolean canStructureGenerate(net.minecraft.block.Block block,
                           int meta,
                           Location location)
        Description copied from interface: StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity
        Same as StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity.isBlockValid(Block, int, Location) except if false, the whole structure is prevented from generating. Most times you just want this method to consist of: return this.isBlockValid(block, location);
        Specified by:
        canStructureGenerate in interface StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity
